Version: 1.0.1
Utils for ryoka.

Usage:
    from ryoka_utils.utils import Utils
    utils = Utils()

Method:
    function: chmod(path, mode)
    function: copy(src, dst)
    function: is_root()
    function: is_type(path, type_name)
    function: join_dirs(path_list)
    function: mkdir(path)
    function: popd()
    function: pushd(path)
    function: remove(path)
    function: rename(src, dst)
    function: unzip_tar(src, dst)
    function: unzip_tar_bz2(src, dst)
    function: unzip_tar_gz(src, dst)
    function: zip_tar(src, dst, mode)
    function: zip_tar_bz2(src, dst)
    function: zip_tar_gz(src, dst)
